item.description:
Come check out The People’s Party, a groove-filled rock/funk/jazz/hippie-hop band based out of Boston, this Saturday, January 12th, 2013 at McGann’s in Boston at 10pm. They will be playing in support of “The Townies” record release party.

The People’s Party sounds like a completely platonic orgy between The Grateful Dead, The Roots, Paul Simon, Talking Heads, The Meters, and Dave Matthews Band.

You can see more about them at www.facebook.com/ThePeoplesPartyMusic or www.reverbnation.com/thepeoplesparty

A link to the event of Facebook is https://www.facebook.com/events/458751480848665/

Peace and Blessings!
item.name: The People's Party at McGann's this Saturday
